mapper.insert: insert into report(reporterUser, reportedUser, category, content, PostIdx, CommentIdx) values( #{reporterUser}, #{reportedUser}, #{category}, #{content}, COALESCE(#{PostIdx}, 0), COALESCE(#{CommentIdx}, 0) );
mapper.select: select * from report where reporterUser=#{reporter} and reportedUser=#{reported} and category=#{category} LIMIT 1

select r.*, p.report_status p_status, c.report_status c_status from report r left outer join post p on r.postIdx = p.post_idx left outer join post_comment c on r.commentidx = c.comment_idx order by reportIdx desc LIMIT #{offset}, #{pageSize}
